title: Pruning! 3 Ministry Areas to Tackle
itunes:title: Pruning! 3 Ministry Areas to Tackle
description: It's nobody's favorite activity. But unfocused churches have competing events, programs and ministries that pull them in all different directions. Tony and Amy discuss three areas that both healthy and unhealthy churches need to prune.
content:encoded: It's nobody's favorite activity. But unfocused churches have competing events, programs and ministries that pull them in all different directions. Tony and Amy discuss three areas that both healthy and unhealthy churches need to prune.
itunes:subtitle: A Biblical Practice Stuck Churches Tend To Ignore
itunes:author: Tony Morgan
